definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: The physical and chemical properties of the carbon black are detected, and its microstructure is analysed by High Revolution Electromicroscopy (HREM) and X-ray Diffraction.
sentences.chinese: 射线衍射和高分辨率透射电镜分析了样品的微观结构。

sentences.english: The experimental parameters of spectrograph for high resolution (HR) spectroscopy are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了高分辨率光谱实验的光谱仪参数。

sentences.english: The theories of wavelet transform and multi-resolution analysis are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了小波变换和多分辨率分析理论。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a frequency direction-based multiresolution image fusion method.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种基于频带方向的多分辨率图像融合方法。

sentences.english: Take advantage of resource-processing tools that red UCe PNG resolution and color depth.
sentences.chinese: 利用资源处理工具减少PNG的分辨率和色深。

sentences.english: Composite connections are only low-resolution, and are not ideal for HDTVs.
sentences.chinese: 复合视频接口仅是低分辨率的，不适合高清电视。

sentences.english: So if the wall is 9m wide, use 18m as the width to consider resolution.
sentences.chinese: 因此如果长城宽9米，那么就用18米作为分辨率。

sentences.english: This is because motion estimation is performed to sub-pixel resolution.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为运动估计执行到子像素分辨率。

sentences.english: Draw textured with overlaid lightmap resolution grid.
sentences.chinese: 绘制带有覆盖光照贴图分辨率网格纹理。

sentences.english: The large image is the highest-resolution version of the image.
sentences.chinese: 供下载的大图为最高分辨率版本。

sentences.english: A high-resolution CT scan can also be performed to look at the temporal bones for dehiscence.
sentences.chinese: 高分辨率的CT检查也能用于检查颞骨是否开裂。

sentences.english: Optical resolution is expressed as a ratio of the distance to the resolution spot divided by the diameter of the spot.
sentences.chinese: 光分辨率是以距离到镭射点直径的比例关系来描述的。

sentences.english: C8 capillary column provided poor resolution.
sentences.chinese: C8的毛细管柱提供的分辨率较低。

sentences.english: A new learning-based super-resolution algorithm for face images is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出一个基于学习的人脸图像超分辨率算法。

sentences.english: Can I set the resolution and confidence values myself when I run the statement?
sentences.chinese: 我在运行该语句时，可以自己设置分辨率和置信度吗？

sentences.english: New high-resolution satellite imagery, however, appears to belie the general's statement.
sentences.chinese: 但是，新的高分辨率卫星照片却否定了将军的说法。

definition: contrast (balance of black and white in TV screen setup)/degree of contrast
inch (unit of length equal to 2.54 cm.)
